name: cookmate
description: CookMate - AI Kitchen Assistant - Full Stack Monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/functions && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: if not exist backend\functions\.env (copy backend\functions\.env.template backend\functions\.env) else (echo Environment file already exists)
scripts.setup:check: echo Checking prerequisites... && node --version && npm --version && echo Checking if setup is complete... && if exist node_modules if exist frontend\node_modules if exist backend\functions\node_modules (echo ✅ All dependencies installed) else (echo ❌ Some dependencies missing. Run: npm run setup)
scripts.test:health: curl -s http://localhost:5001/api/health || echo 'Backend not running. Start with: npm run start:backend'
